work_content.company: Towngas - The Hong Kong and China Gas Company

content.description: Developed and built Internal chatbot infrastructure using machine learning with web crawling. Developed several Alexa skills by using programming languages like nodejs and python along with AWS services like AWS Lambda and AWS IoT and with RaspberryPi. Developed Andriod app for demoing Estimote Beacon use cases. Held several sections of sharings for IoT development and chatbot development

Assisted lead developers in developing mobile game, Be A Man: Do The Right Thing by using game engine Unity with C# and playmaker. Cooperate visual and hearing effects and create Animation by using game engine Unity 2D.

content.description: Enforce housing policies and assisting resident needs. Create a safe and active environment for residents that from different background. Rated Averagely 4.5/5 in Adjusting Position, Reliability and Representation for the Department and the Position. (2016 - 2017)

content.description: Assist students with academic needs including counseling and tutoring.

content.description: Assist international students in the process of exploring and identifying their identities. Eliminate the gap between locals and international students within campus and society; Plan and Organize activities.
